resources.string: I declare that I am at least 14 years old
I declare that I have read the privacy policy
There was an error with the download, open OneVoice to try again
To ensure this mode works properly in the background, enable notifications
Are you sure you want to disconnect from
Are you sure to connect with
It is not possible to use the Conversation mode without location and bluetooth permissions, go to the settings to grant them, or reinstall the app
Without the microphone permission the voice recognition does not work, go to the settings to grant the permission or reinstall the app
There was an error with the tts initialization, do you want to continue without tts?
In this device there is no google tts engine, download it to be able to use the tts
The key file to use the API does not work, insert a working key file
Enter the key file to use the API
It is not possible to use the Conversation mode because this device does not have Bluetooth Low Energy
To start OneVoice an internet connection is required, check your connection
To perform the operation an internet connection is required, check your connection
Unable to translate message, check internet connection
To view the languages you need an internet connection, check your connection and try again
cannot interact with devices during connection
cannot interact with devices during disconnection
Error while taking the file, try again
Error during image selection, use another gallery to select it
You must be at least 14 years old to use the app
You must have read the privacy policy to use the app
The text contains illegal characters, only the following characters are allowed:

There was an error loading the files of the models for translation and speech recognition, probably some files are corrupted, try restarting the app, if the problem persists then press the fix button and only the corrupted files will be re-downloaded.
Error in the download, please ensure you have internet connection and retry:
Error in the transfer of the downloaded file from external to internal memory, please ensure you have not removed an sd card or other external storage devices and retry keeping the app open:
Your device has less than 6GB of RAM, the app needs at least 6GB of RAM to work, you can still try to use it, but it will most likely crash.
Low storage space, the download may fail

The voice recognition rounds the cost of each request to the nearest multiple of 15 seconds, the average total cost (both translator and voice recognition), without taking into account the rounding, is 2.5 dollars per hour, also for WalkieTalkie must add the language detection costs to the translation, to learn more read the tutorial
This screen will search and make us visible to other devices that use OneVoice to be able to establish a connection with them and start the conversation
To find out how to get the key file read the tutorial
Your name will be displayed by all nearby devices, while your profile picture will only be shown on devices with which you have already had conversations
Now OneVoice will download the neural network models necessary for translation and speech recognition, once finished you can start using the app (even offline).

The Conversation mode is the main feature of OneVoice, it allows you to translate a conversation between several people in real time, for a better experience it is recommended to connect bluetooth headphones to the phone, furthermore the application will continue to work also in background and with the phone on standby (however, some phones may have performance issues when the app runs in the background)

WalkieTalkie mode is the secondary functionality of OneVoice, it does not allow real-time translation but is designed to work with just one phone, it automatically detects and translates a speech in a language into another language, and the application will continue to work in background and with the phone on standby

OneVoice uses OpenAi\'s Whisper for speech recognition and Meta\'s NLLB for translations, these models require quite a bit of power and at least 6GB of RAM to run, so make sure you\'re using a modern smartphone to avoid slowdowns or crashes. For more info on OneVoice visit the GitHub project of the app here
To speak, OneVoice uses the system\'s default TTS engine, the recommended TTS is the Google TTS, but you can choose the one you prefer, to select it, click on the button below
Show original transcriptions beyond the translation
Support languages with low quality tts
Show only the most common languages in the selection list
Select the volume level you need to start and maintain voice recognition
It allow to also supports languages that have low translation or speech recognition quality
It allows to show the original transcription beyond the translation of the message.
It allow to also supports languages that have a low quality speech synthesizer
System settings of tts, an eventual change of the preferred engine will be applied only after the restart of the app
Select the time after you stop talking to send the transcribed text
Select the length of the recording before you start speaking that will be included in the voice recognition
Set the beam size of the beam search algorithm, to improve translation quality at the expense of speed (only for text translation)
